title: Mark Hopkins Hotel
description: Street scene in San Francisco featuring the Mark Hopkins Hotel. There are several cars, including a prominent yellow taxi, stopped near a busy intersection marked by traffic lights and street signs for Mason and California Streets. The architecture is characterized by a mix of brick and ornate white facades.
